definition: predictable/sth one can predict without being a clairvoyant
the biblical books of the prophets
lit. the duck is the first to know if the spring water is warm (idiom)/fig. an expert in the field knows which way the wind blows
pinyin: chun1 jiang1 shui3 nuan3 ya1 xian1 zhi1

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 这就是你们自己证明，是杀害先知者的子孙了。

sentences.english: Inarius took the guise of a human as The Prophet of the Cathedral of Light.
sentences.chinese: 印那瑞斯本人伪装成一个人类，作为光之大教堂先知。

sentences.english: He may have been influenced by the prophet Isaiah whose ministry covered much of Hezekiah's reign.
sentences.chinese: 以赛亚主要是在希西家在位年间作先知的事奉。

sentences.english: So the young man， even the young man the prophet， went to Ramothgilead.
sentences.chinese: 于是那少年先知往基列的拉末去了。

sentences.english: And the multitude said, This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee.
sentences.chinese: 众人说，这是加利利拿撒勒的先知耶稣。

sentences.english: Jesus also is a prophet martyr.
Christians believe that Emanuel is the prophet Isaiah's prophecy of the Messiah.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒相信以马内利就是先知以赛亚所预言的弥赛亚。

sentences.english: 27During this time some prophets came down from Jerusalem to Antioch.
sentences.chinese: 当那些日子，有几位先知从耶路撒冷下到安提阿。

sentences.english: The Prophet is a poetry collection written by Gibran, a forerunner of Arabic contemporary literature.
sentences.chinese: 《先知》是阿拉伯现代文学先驱纪伯伦的一部散文诗。

sentences.english: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification, and exhortation, and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 但作先知讲道的，是对人说，要造就，安慰，劝勉人。

sentences.english: The prophets prophesied by Baal, following worthless idols .
sentences.chinese: 先知借巴力说预言，随从无益的神。

sentences.english: Treat the poor people are the virtues of the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 善待贫困人是众先知的美德。

sentences.english: This is certainly what Freud foresaw.
sentences.chinese: 这确实是佛洛伊德的先知之明。

sentences.english: Traditionally, Elijah is seen as a representative of the Prophets at the Transfiguration.
sentences.chinese: 传统上说，以利亚是变容中的一位先知代表。

sentences.english: They accept the Prophet's precepts but reject some of his strictures.
sentences.chinese: 先知的教训，但拒绝他的种种约束。

definition: Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
